text: Haan jo shaks na paye uss kay zimmay do maheenon kay laga taar rozay hain iss say pehlay kay aik doosray ko haath lagayen aur jiss shaks ko yeh taqat bhi na ho uss per saathh (60) miskeenon ka khana khilana hai. Yeh iss liye kay tum Allah ki aur uss kay rasool ki hukum bardari kero yeh Allah Taalaa ki muqarrar kerda hadden hain aur kuffaar hi kay liye dard naak azab hai
